channel.title: CVE Feed for Kriesi -- Enfold - Responsive Multi-Purpose Theme
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kriesi -- Enfold - Responsive Multi-Purpose Theme

item.title: CVE-2023-38400|2023-11-30T16:57:16.768Z -- kriesi -- enfold%20-%20responsive%20multi-purpose%20theme
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Kriesi Enfold - Responsive Multi-Purpose Theme allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Enfold - Responsive Multi-Purpose Theme: from n/a through 5.6.4.
